item.description:
Hilton Garden Inn, Freeport, ME

The Sixth Annual Spa, Knit and Spin will take place Saturday, February 23 and Sunday morning, February 24, 2008. NO CHARGE to attend.

Thought we could take a road trip up to Freeport Maine for the day. It's about a 1:15 minute drive.

If we're 5 or less Steph will be happy to drive her car.

We'll plan to meet at the Starbucks at 9:30 and leave from there. Return around 5 unless group prefers a different time.


Since we all have questions about what "Spa" really is, I was doing some reading and found this explaination." "Spa is all about relaxation and having a great time. You will find many places to park yourself to spin, knit, crochet or whatever your heart desires. Chairs, cushy couches and fireplaces ( at the Harraseeket Inn) are provided as well as a vendor mercantile full of fabulous fibery things to entice and inspire you. It will be worth the trip! :0)"
item.name: Spa Knit & Spin 6
